text: Jisas aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ sɨhinda ambami, Sɨhinda tɨhi kuyu muŋandɨhin indarɨmara. Kru mumɨŋga wain kɨva mɨŋami. Kamata tapa haŋandɨhin tɨmbayɨ tama taŋgɨrata arɨndɨhuyɨvɨmi. Kamata kɨva tuŋgɨ hambu wain kɨrɨs taŋguvusɨvusɨrɨm kumba kayɨvata musa mɨŋata, kru kɨta kɨva ha karatamatamarɨm tavɨ kuta ŋandi tɨhumi. Kamata kru muvɨra sɨmbɨra mɨŋɨmandɨyu vata kɨva ha nurɨŋandɨ kumañɨ tamami. Kamata pɨhu mu kutañɨ umi.21.33 Wain kɨvandu tɨhi kuyu nɨŋandɨhin, Jisas Aisaia 5.1-2yɨ ŋgami. Got krunavundi Israelɨŋ andɨmirɨm tɨhi kuyu. Tɨhi kuyundu sapa ha nɨmata. Kɨva nɨŋuva hama Got. Wain kɨva ha krunavundi Israel hati.
